resources.string: \"This applications needs Fine Accuracy permission in order to determine the closet stops bus to your location. It will not function properly without it. Will you allow it? \"
This applications needs Fine Accuracy permission in order to determine the closet stops bus to your location. Please start the application again and allow this permission
CTA Bus Tracker data provided by the Chicago Transit Authority \n https://www.transitchicago.com/developers/bustracker/
